# [`format()`]{.blue}
 
 
### [format]{.blue}(*number(s)*, scientific=FALSE){.center} 
 
# What it does 

+ Use [`format()`]{.blue} to display numbers and text many formats and alignment options.
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r eval=TRUE}
huge <- 1000000000000000
format(huge, big.mark=",", scientific=FALSE)
```
  
 
# Usefull stuff 

+ [`format()`]{.blue} is useful for showing huge and tiny numbers without scientific notation.
+ [`format()`]{.blue} can be use display aligned text.
